main: ^Excuse me, is this where I can leave lost items?
^Yes, my name is Jhoon, how may I help you?

g-1: ^Hello, uh, Jhoon? I found these headphones on a chair next to a terminal, I think someone is missing them
^Thanks for returning it! Was there anything else besides the headphones there?
g-2: ^I don't quite remember, maybe trash? it's been a while since this place had a good cleaning
^So yeah, I don't think there was anything else

askMore: ^If you spot anything else that might help please come back!

g-0: ^Sure, I have time, I'll do that if I find anything, uh, Jhoon.
